Description: We are looking for a passionate Creative Director to spearhead our live experiences division and art studio. In this role, you will be responsible for driving the creative vision, overseeing the production process, and ensuring the delivery of extraordinary live events that leave audiences mesmerized. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to conceptualize and execute innovative, immersive, and unforgettable entertainment experiences.Skills
Skills:
Develop and communicate a clear and compelling creative vision that aligns with the project's brand and objectives.
Lead brainstorming sessions to generate innovative concepts for our new projects, ensuring they are unique, engaging, and on-brand.
Manage and inspire a team of creative professionals, including writers, designers, artists, and technical experts, to bring concepts to life.
Oversee all aspects of event production, from scheduling to casting, set design, and technical production that fits the project budget.
Provide artistic direction to ensure the visual and audio elements of live experiences are of the highest quality and meet artistic standards.
Collaborate closely with vendors, and key stakeholders to ensure seamless execution for our new projects.
Stay up-to-date with industry trends and emerging technologies to infuse fresh ideas and innovation into live experiences.
Identify potential risks in the creative and production process and develop contingency plans to mitigate them.

Proven experience as a Creative Director or in a similar creative leadership role within the entertainment industry.
Bachelor’s degree / Masters in marketing, design or any art related field.
Proven English & Arabic language skills.
A strong portfolio showcasing successful live experience productions and creative work.
Excellent leadership and team management skills.
Exceptional creative thinking and problem-solving abilities.
In-depth knowledge of current entertainment trends and technologies.
Strong communication and presentation skills.
Flexibility and adaptability in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
Passion for pushing creative boundaries and creating extraordinary live experiences.
“Roll up your sleeves” attitude.
